meaningMnemonic:
When a king takes a princess for a wife, she becomes a <vocabulary>queen</vocabulary>. 

王妃 is a word for the wife of a reigning king. She's a queen because of who she married, not because she has any power herself. The more technical term for that is <vocabulary>queen consort</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
